text: btw in the deisgn manager the rich text fields are showing horizontal scroll bars - pretty confident it’s a result of the “advanced” button being added.
To confirm, is the issue the scrollbar sometimes is getting "stuck" and always visible, rather than only when you are scrolling?
I think you may be thinking of something else, here I’ll screencast it
So that is to support smaller screen sizes where the entire rich text toolbar does not fit on your screen, but I do see how when it is only slightly overflowing it can be odd
yea, it’s just an odd sight. I’m on a wide screen monitor, and it seems like some things could maybe be done to avoid that
functionality wise it of course works. just looks unintended. maybe shorten advanced to `adv.` with a title=“Advanced”

have a button make it say something like “Dev” or keep it saying “advanced”, but when you click it instead of getting the popout menu with only 1 item, have it go
“If ye can pass thy test ye can view the source of the universe”

then it just says “close the tag to gain access `<div>` <input>”
then just store if they passed with a cookie and just add the button directly to the UI like it used to be. 1 button click

or, if you REALLY want to make it so just people who know what they’re doing can see it. make it so when you open the page editor or design manager, and inspect it, then go into console and enter `enable_god_mode()` you get the button
